subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Pour Moi, the 4-1 second favorite ridden by 19-year-old Mickael Barzalona and trained by Andre Fabre, won Britain’s Epsom Derby by a head with a late run.
snippet: Pour Moi, the 4-1 second favorite ridden by 19-year-old Mickael Barzalona and trained by Andre Fabre, won Britain’s Epsom Derby by a head with a late run.
